Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm suggesting a price of $120 for it. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features that make this product stand out. I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or needs. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information to consider this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
